title: How Many Calories Are in Water?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in water—spoiler: zero! Get full nutrition details per 100 ml, equivalents, and tweaks for flavored variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Water?
assumptions: Plain, pure water at room temperature; no additives, flavors, or minerals.
disclaimer: Nutrition for water is universally zero, but flavored, carbonated, or mineral waters may add trace calories from additives. Always check labels.

quick_answer.text: Water has zero calories, making it the ultimate hydrator with no nutritional impact.

label_note: All values are zero, mirroring empty Nutrition Facts for pure water.

tweaks.label: Add a slice of lemon (per 100 ml)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a glass of water?
faqs.a: Zero calories in plain water, regardless of volume.
Plain sparkling water has 0 calories; sweetened versions add some.

faqs.q: Are there calories in mineral water?
faqs.a: No, pure mineral water is calorie-free; check for added flavors.

faqs.q: How many calories in flavored water?
faqs.a: Varies; unsweetened is ~0, but sugary flavors can add 10–50 kcal per 100 ml.
